Class BattleRoyale.BattleRoyaleBuilder

java.lang.Object
dev.royalcore.api.br.BattleRoyale.BattleRoyaleBuilder
Enclosing class:
BattleRoyale
public static class BattleRoyale.BattleRoyaleBuilder extends Object
Builder for BattleRoyale instances, providing a fluent API to configure scenarios, settings, and lifecycle callbacks.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BattleRoyaleBuilder(UUID id)
    Creates a builder for a BattleRoyale with the given ID.

    • BattleRoyaleBuilder

      public BattleRoyaleBuilder(UUID id)
      Creates a builder for a BattleRoyale with the given ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID to assign to the Battle Royale

      Returns:
      this builder instance for chaining

      this builder instance for chaining

    • onStart

      public BattleRoyale.BattleRoyaleBuilder onStart(Runnable runnable)
      Sets the onStart callback that will be invoked when the Battle Royale starts.
      Parameters:
      runnable - the start callback
      Returns:
      this builder instance for chaining

    • onStop

      public BattleRoyale.BattleRoyaleBuilder onStop(Runnable runnable)
      Sets the onStop callback that will be invoked when the Battle Royale stops.
      Parameters:
      runnable - the stop callback
      Returns:
      this builder instance for chaining

    • onStart

      public BattleRoyale.BattleRoyaleBuilder onStart(Consumer<Runnable> runnable)
      Allows external code to access and modify the currently configured onStart callback.
      Parameters:
      runnable - a consumer that receives the current start callback
      Returns:
      this builder instance for chaining
